scripts.network: export UI_PORT=$(port) && npm run build:test-happ && concurrently "cd ui/ && npm run start $UI_PORT" "npm run launch:happ"
scripts.launch:happ: RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS ./workdir/sensemaker-enabled/provider-sensemaker.happ -w --ui-port $UI_PORT network mdns
scripts.test: npm run build:happ && cd tests/ && npm run test
scripts.package: npm run build:happ && npm run build:ui && cd nh-launcher-applet/ && npm run package:ui && cd ../ && hc web-app pack workdir
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:dnas && hc app pack ./workdir
scripts.build:test-happ: npm run build:dnas && hc app pack ./workdir/sensemaker-enabled
scripts.build:dnas: npm run build:zomes && hc dna pack ./dnas/provider/workdir
scripts.clean:modules: rimraf node_modules; for DIR in $(find -type d -iname node_modules); do echo "  Remove $DIR"; rm -Rf "$DIR"; done
scripts.clean: npm run clean:downloaded; npm run clean:build; npm run clean:modules
